languages.text: "Содействие мастера Херимона сыграло важную роль, Ваша Светлость. Ему удалось не только защитить мое бренное тело, но и искусно вплести тембр своего псионического звучания в гармонию хорала. Я сожалею, что он не был подле меня при прошлом обряде".

traits.locale_text: "Среди зыбких вариаций будущего наш шанс на выживание был подобен блику света на мутной глади воды. Но ваш выбор в пользу мастера Херимона сыграл ключевую роль, Ваша Светлость. Ему удалось не только защитить мое бренное тело, но и искусно вплести тембр своего псионического звучания в гармонию хорала".

languages.text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."
languages.original_text: "Содействие мастера Херимона сыграло важную роль, Ваша Светлость. Ему удалось не только защитить мое бренное тело, но и искусно вплести тембр своего псионического звучания в гармонию хорала. Я сожалею, что он не был подле меня при прошлом обряде".

traits.locale_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

"Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

"Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

"Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

languages.text: «La colaboración del maestro Herimon fue decisiva, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No solo protegió mi envoltura mortal; también integró de forma magistral el timbre de su canto psiónico en la armonía de la coral. Lamento que no estuviese a mi lado para el último ritual».
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

traits.locale_text: «La colaboración del maestro Herimon fue decisiva, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No solo protegió mi envoltura mortal; también integró de forma magistral el timbre de su canto psiónico en la armonía de la coral. Lamento que no estuviese a mi lado para el último ritual».

languages.text: 「陛下、マスター・ヘリモンはかなり助けてくれました。彼は私の肉体を守ってくれ、超能力的な音色を、合唱が奏でる音色の調和に巧みに融合させてくれた。最後の儀式に彼がそばにいなかったことだけが残念です」
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、マスター・ヘリモンはかなり助けてくれました。彼は私の肉体を守ってくれ、超能力的な音色を、合唱が奏でる音色の調和に巧みに融合させてくれた。最後の儀式に彼がそばにいなかったことだけが残念です」

languages.text: “赫瑞蒙大师的协助发挥了重要作用，大人。他不仅守护了我的肉体，还能熟练地将他的灵能音色加入唱诗班的和谐之音中。要是之前举行那场仪式的时候，他也能在我身边就好了。”
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

traits.locale_text: “赫瑞蒙大师的协助发挥了重要作用，大人。他不仅守护了我的肉体，还能熟练地将他的灵能音色加入唱诗班的和谐之音中。要是之前举行那场仪式的时候，他也能在我身边就好了。”

languages.text: "Meister Herimons Unterstützung war entscheidend, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Er konnte nicht nur meinen sterblichen Leib schützen, sondern hat das Timbre seiner psionischen Laute geschickt in die Harmonie des Chorals eingebunden. Ich bedauere, dass er während des letzten Ritus nicht an meiner Seite war."
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

traits.locale_text: "Meister Herimons Unterstützung war entscheidend, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Er konnte nicht nur meinen sterblichen Leib schützen, sondern hat das Timbre seiner psionischen Laute geschickt in die Harmonie des Chorals eingebunden. Ich bedauere, dass er während des letzten Ritus nicht an meiner Seite war."

languages.text: « Maître Herimon s'est avéré un soutien inestimable, Votre Seigneurie. Il a non seulement protégé mon enveloppe mortelle, mais a également su intégrer à la perfection son chant psionique à l'harmonie du chœur. Je me suis surpris à regretter de ne pas l'avoir eu à mes côtés lors du dernier rituel. »
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Herimon s'est avéré un soutien inestimable, Votre Seigneurie. Il a non seulement protégé mon enveloppe mortelle, mais a également su intégrer à la perfection son chant psionique à l'harmonie du chœur. Je me suis surpris à regretter de ne pas l'avoir eu à mes côtés lors du dernier rituel. »

languages.text: "Üstat Herimon'un yardımları son derece faydalı oldu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Yalnızca fâni bedenimi korumakla kalmadı, aynı zamanda ruhsezi enerjisinin tınısını koronun harmonisiyle ustaca harmanladı. Son ayinde yanımda olmamasından üzüntü duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon's assistance was instrumental, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. He was able to not only protect my mortal body, but also to skilfully blend the timbre of his psionic sound into the harmony of the chorale. I regret that he was not at my side for the last rite."
